turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about USS Bagley (DD-386).
turn.1: What did USS Bagley (DD-386) do in World War II?
turn.2: Over the next several weeks, numerous small Japanese air raids appeared on her radar screen, but only one closed the formation, an ineffective attack by a lone plane on the 12th.
turn.4: On 28 April, while the escort carriers launched raids on Sakishima Gunto, the crew spotted an Ohka "kamikaze" pass harmlessly overhead at .
turn.6: On 24 May, after "Bagley" "blew out" her number one main generator, she turned toward the Philippines.
turn.8: Arriving in Leyte Gulf on the 27th after 102 days underway at sea, the destroyer went alongside for repairs.
turn.9: Did she have any other missions?
turn.10: The warship's last combat operation began on 15 June when the destroyer departed Leyte for Kerama Retto.
turn.11: What did she do after that?
turn.12: She rendezvoused with the six escort carriers of TG 32.1 on the 18th and supported them during a series of air strikes on Okinawa.
